description: The most advanced, and carefully crafted high-altitude climbing parka ever made: the Absolute Zero™ Parka now uses 800-fill RDS-Certified, fluorine-free Allied Down—the most responsibly-sourced and -processed down insulation available. Working with Garrett Madison, big mountain guide and Mountain Hardwear elite athlete, to ensure that the evolution of this welded, waterproof construction continues to withstand the harshest conditions atop the worlds highest peaks.
name: Mountain Hardwear Absolute Zero Parka - Mens
